message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $127.50?
